name: Cat On Board
description:
This is a work in progress. More coming soon!

Collect all  5  chicken wings before the timer runs out!

Controls :     Use WASD or  Arrow Keys

  • UP : Jump
  • DOWN : Push
  • LEFT/RIGHT : Brake*

*   You can also move a tiny bit LEFT or  RIGHT while in the air.

Credits :

  • Free City Tileset by Penusbmic
  • Godot Tutorials
